text: Juan José Muko Nsue Nzang (born 14 January 1993), known as Juanjo Muko or simply Juanjo, is an Equatoguinean footballer who plays as a forward. ==Club career== After graduate from Atlético Madrid, he moved to England. There, he played at Arlesey Town in the Southern League Premier Division after playing for Farnborough and Whyteleafe. ==International career== Juanjo was called by the Equatoguinean senior national team for the first time in October 2010 for a friendly match against Botswana. However, he was unable to attend. Juanjo made his debut on 8 February 2011, when he played a friendly match against Chad. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:People from Malabo Category:Equatoguinean footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Farnborough F.C. players Category:Arlesey Town F.C. players Category:Equatorial Guinea international footballers Category:Equatoguinean expatriate footballers Category:Equatoguinean expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Expatriate footballers in Spain Category:Equatoguinean expatriate sportspeople in England Category:Expatriate footballers in England
title: Juanjo Muko Nsue
